description: "A map of the bay of the port city of Batavia (Jakarta). To aid navigation, a rhumbline network (the web of interconnected lines), bathymetry (sea depth), and small islands, shoals and reefs are marked. An inset map shows the city in more detail."
title: "De reede en stadt Batavia [cartographic material] : is geleegen aan de noord kust van 't eyland Groot Iava inde Oost Indische Zee"
